description:
Introducing the ultimate game for those who value peace and are ready to step up and prove their skills in the face of rebellion. As a commander, your duty is clear: confront the terrorists and follow the headquarters' instructions meticulously. 
     Key Features:
   ▪ Realistic FPS Action: Experience the adrenaline of realistic first-person shooter combat.
   ▪ Versatile Gameplay: Blend skills, strategy, and action while leading your Frontline Special Forces into the heart of conflict.
   ▪ Rescue Operations: Your mission goes beyond eliminating terrorists. Save innocent lives, including a girl held captive by terrorists, ensuring her safety.
   ▪ Bomb Defusal: Race against time to defuse rebel-planted bombs. Your composure under pressure can save countless lives.
   ▪ Citywide Safety: The fate of the entire city is in your hands. Safeguard the population from rebel chaos and restore peace.
     Will you be the hero that restores peace and saves the day? The world needs a hero, and that hero is you!
name: Call of Sniper Combat - WW2
intro: Crush the rebels, restore peace, and make the world a safer place. Will you answer the call?
